Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Bavarian \Ba*va"ri*an\, a. Of or pertaining to Bavaria. -- n. A native or an inhabitant of Bavaria. [1913 Webster]
{Bavarian cream}. See under {Cream}. [1913 Webster]
Bavarian adj : of or relating to or characteristic of Bavaria or its people; "Bavarian beer"
